Comment: I'm just making fun of a poorly written headline.  The subject is horrible though.  I worked 911 for five years.  I once had a man take a fist full of sleeping pills then run into the woods.  He called 911, but was too incoherent to tell me where he was.  I only had phase 1 location.  I had roughly 40 people trying to find this guy with only a phone number and the location of the cell phone tower his phone was using.   I got to listen to him fade away.    Dark humor is my coping mechanism.
Author: FrankSinatraYodeling
